title: Coinbase Login page error after the latest update 109.0 (64-bit)
content: Hi, I login daily to my Coinbase account "https://www.coinbase.com/" using FF, and after the latest update 109.0 (64-bit), after entering username, FF keeps looping back to the login page asking for username again. There is no login issue when using Chrome or Brave browsers. Thank you
creator: cbonakdar

title: New Update as an Error (!) Need Help
content:
Hello, the menu bar has an error. Before the update, I could move all addons to the overhang menu (Überhangmenü). With the new update, an additional symbol is forcibly inserted, which I cannot remove. I would like to move the AddOns back to the overhang menu.

The AddON icons are now way too big and in general I want to remove the AddON icon. Can someone help?
creator: joni_mond
